alert.note: Alert for Cuyahoga; Medina (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 01 at 11:59AM EDT until April 01 at 12:45PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Medina County in northeastern Ohio... Cuyahoga County in northeastern Ohio... * Until 1245 PM EDT. * At 1158 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Avon Lake to near Savannah, moving northeast at 55 mph. Strong wind gusts in excess of 50 mph will continue even after the rain exits. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Public reported. There have been several measured wind gusts in excess of 60 mph and reports of down trees and power-lines with this line of thunderstorms. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Cleveland, Medina, Parma, Lakewood, Euclid, Cleveland Heights, Strongsville, Brunswick, Westlake, North Royalton, Solon, Wadsworth, Warrensville Heights, Rittman, Lodi, Highland Hills, Chippewa Lake, North Olmsted, Garfield Heights and Shaker Heights. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Strong wind gusts in excess of 50 mph will continue even after the rain exits.
